Name: Slime Simulator Games
About the game: Slime Simulator Games - Super Fun Slime Simulator Games This Slime Simulator Game is designed to Calm your nerves and entertain you at the same time. You can now Smash as many Slimes as you want, super satisfying to watch, and even more satisfying to DIY. Enjoy this super fun free app with more than 20 Slime Recipes, Every Recipe is unique and has its own DIY and effect for your ultimate satisfaction. You won't need a tutorial to use it at all.
